summary.span: 枚举传递到语音合成事件的数据指针的类型。

span.span: Enumerates the types of data pointers passed to speech synthesis events.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EventParameterType Token = int32(1)

summary.span: 指示传到 的参数 是一个

span.span: Indicates that the argument to the is a

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是`System.IntPtr`使用创建 `System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure`is a `System.IntPtr` created using `System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure` 引用 Windows 桌面语音技术令牌-Windows 桌面语音技术表示的对象资源，例如语音 ();`param1`可能具有任何值。referencing a Windows Desktop Speech Technology token --a Windows Desktop Speech Technology object representing a resource, such as a voice (); `param1` may take on any value. > [!NOTE] > 当前实例的托管复合语音引擎，使用的成员编写命名空间，构造完毕后将无法更改资源Currently instances of a managed synthetic speech engines, written using the members of the name space, cannot change resources after construction

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EventParameterType Undefined = int32(0)

summary.span: 指示传到 的参数 未定义。

span.span: Indicates that the argument to the is undefined.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，`param1`和`param2`都将被忽略。Generally, `param1` and `param2` are then ignored. 但是，如果是，可以生成一个进度指示器事件`param1`应为包含在当前单词长度的整数和`param2``System.IntPtr`引用包含当前的偏移量的整数word。However, if is , a progress meter event can be generated `param1` should be an integer containing the length of the current word, and `param2` a `System.IntPtr` referencing an integer containing the offset of the current word.
